name: Canada Immigration Partners
overview:
The immigration procedure in Canada evolves in quick time. CIP-Canada Immigration Partners has legal expert and consultant who are well updated about these changes. CIP-Canada Immigration Partners is a renowned for its client ’s service. Many business tycoons, students and even common people have immigrated successfully under Canada Immigration Partners.

Our team of professionals will ensure that you are well informed about your options and will help you navigate through a process that may at times seem overwhelming. CIP-Canada Immigration Partners has the experience and expertise to advise you about all the immigration opportunities open to you. With a professional team at your side, you can achieve your goals.

Since our practice focuses exclusively on immigration and citizenship, we remain fully informed about any changes in policy and procedure and can therefore advise clients on the best possible options that suit their situation. Our highly competent and professional Regulated Canadian immigration consultant (RCIC) and lawyers provide a full range of services to clients pursuing Canadian visas, permits, permanent residence and citizenship.

Our Services

Permanent Resident

Economic Class Immigration
PR card/ Renewal PR card
Family Class Immigration

Temporary status

Temporary Residents Visa
Live-In caregiver
Study Permit Visa
Work Permit Visa

Citizenship

Adoption and Restoration
Passport Services
Restoration of Citizenship
Renouncing and Revoking Citizenship

Inadmissibility

Criminal Admissibility
Medical Admissibility

Hearing and Appeals

Immigration Appeal Division Case
Immigration Division Hearing
